title: Rulehub Policy Annotations
description: JSON Schema fragment describing required rulehub.* annotations for policy YAML metadata.annotations.

rulehub.id.description: Stable dotted identifier of the policy (lowercase, segments separated by dots).

rulehub.title.description: Human readable short title of the policy.

rulehub.links.description: Optional multi-line or list of reference links (when represented as scalar block in YAML this schema treats it as string)
